Member Function Documentation

void BtObexSddbImpl::OnRequestStateChange (  BtRequestType  request_type,
BtRequestState  old_request_state,
BtRequestState  new_request_state
)  [protected, virtual]
 

Notification function of changes in running requests.

Whenever the state of a request contained in this service is changed OnRequestStateChange will be called. This function should give the application programmer to do some GUI reaction to the progress or the failure of a partikular request.
This function has to be implemented by the application programmer, so in the base classes this function is pure virtual.

Parameters:
request_type A BtRequestType enumeration type describing which kind of request has changed its state.
old_request_state A BtRequestState enumeration type containing the state of the request before the state transition.
new_request_state A BtRequestState enumeration type containing the state of the request after the state transition.

Implements BtService.
